text: Petra Maria Mede (born 7 March 1970, in Stockholm, Sweden) is a Swedish comedian, dancer and television host. She grew up in Gothenburg. She is known worldwide for presenting the Eurovision Song Contest 2013 and the Eurovision Song Contest in 2016, this time along with Måns Zelmerlöw. She also hosted Melodifestivalen in 2009 and 2016. ==References== Category:1970 births Category:Living people Category:Swedish comedians Category:Swedish dancers Category:Swedish television presenters Category:Eurovision Song Contest presenters Category:Entertainers from Stockholm Category:People from Gothenburg
title: Petra Mede
